text: Nde nza phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nza khueŋ vuzvugi, nde mba vhɨzgi gumgi gu mbigir hɨrga bigeŋ, nde ne kaŋgirga. Nde ne kaŋgirga fhuv, nde pim vhɨzi gumgi ga suaŋv nziv kɨrga. Nde mba Zisas khothɨgi fhuv gumgi gu mbigi farar muuŋgirga. Mbe Fhe Bakɨme taagip mba vhɨzgi gumgi gu mbigi khavɨrga, mbe nen rarga ki fhuvara.
